name: Schaefer's Hammer
flavorText: Forged in the frigid wastes of the north to honor the famed Schaefer artisans.
flavorTextHtml: Forged in the frigid wastes of the north to honor the famed Schaefer artisans.

primary.textHtml: Lightning skills deal [20 - 25]% more damage.

secondary.textHtml: Casting a Lightning skill charges you with Lightning, causing you to deal 842% weapon damage as Lightning every second for 5 seconds to nearby enemies. [650 - 850]%
